3: (Reaches the top of the building) We're finally out... huh?
The guards are still after us.
Nat isn't going to... let me go so easily...
(Roland concentrates the Punishing Virus to his right arm) ...
...Roland?!
(Breaks away from Nanami's control) If I can't beat you...
(Dashes toward Roland) ...!
(Jumps backward) I'll leave it to 'destiny'...
Roland jumps off from up high, and the golden guards leap toward him like hungry beasts...
(Jumps after Roland) He'll get torn into pieces...
Nanami was careless...
(Battles the guards) Shouldn't have given him the opportunity to act freely.
Nanami enters a deadly battle with the guards for Roland...
(Concentrates the Punishing Virus on his arm) All of you... move...!
Although his frame is severely damaged, Roland still manages to throw off the guards and dashes toward the golden light beam...
(Leaps toward the golden light) I've been watching... If I take advantage of its force, I might be able to thrown out of here...
Even though my body will probably be crushed by the impact...
(The light beam is right ahead) As long as my M.I.N.D. device gets carried far enough from the antigen above the desert... I can still summon enough Corrupted here to drag me away...
A slashing tornado appears behind Roland's back...
...What?!
After a wave of slashes, the whole floor begins to collapse... Before Roland can jump into the beam, he is hit by a fallen metal plate and falls into the depths...
(His body keeps getting hit by fallen objects) ...!
Among the debris, Nanami is holding on to a torn cable, hanging above the gulf...
That was so, so close...
Roland, wait for me! Nanami's coming to get you.
